A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you are a Star Wars fan don't waste your time.  The whole movie is full of poor acting\, bad writing\,  lack of character relationship development.  Rey and Kylo Ren do well\, but the rest remind me of when they introduced Jar Jar Binks into the cast.  It's a true disappointment and a fails to deliver a film that is worthy of the original Star Wars franchise.  It's a made for DVD movie.  At this point it should be allowed to die before it completely ruins the Star Wars saga.
